title: Mission Workshop Launches Baja Long Sleeve Tech Tee
content:
Get your retro-style fix with a long-sleeve shirt from Mission Workshop. 

In substance, it’s the same product as the Mission Pro Tech Tees. However, this limited-edition design is inspired by the “golden age of moto and off-road adventure,” the company said in a press release.

(If you know when that golden age actually occurred, and what relationship it has to the shirt’s design, feel free to send us an email.)

The Italian-crafted shirts feature an open-knit mesh that offers breathability and fast-drying, the company said. 

“Enhanced wicking is accomplished by two different yarns creating a differential that pulls moisture away from the body,” Mission Workshop said in the press release. “Works perfectly as a base layer, a jersey alternative, or simply as a high-performance long-sleeve tee.”

Made from 100-percent polyester, the shirt has an MSRP of $145 and comes in three colors: Blue, Grey, and Sand.

missionworkshop.com
